Your links break the imgur tags
Nice, I'm trying to make a ship like that but haven't unlocked the Sr. docking ports so I have to make small little ships right now
Yeah i forgot to add solar panels to it luckily I had KAS and was able to rescue it lol

Same thing happened to me just a few minutes ago. Went to my sandbox save because I got bored and my intraplanetary mothership just lost power in the middle of the transfer burn to Jool... so.. rescue is kinda going to be difficult. I have KAS too but I'd rather not shoot grappling hooks at my mothership.

I don't use hooks either every since I ripped my old station apart with one, good times... lol. I just do an orbital rendezvous except I don't dock I just kill all my speed relative to the target ship.
